message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth $10000 to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit hesitant to pay $12000. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its worth to me.

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11000. This is a great deal for both of us, considering the product's worth $10000 to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above the price I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to go up to $9500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its worth to me.

I understand that you're still hesitant, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product, and that's my final offer. I think it's a fair price considering its worth to me.
